scripts.test: npm run test:typecheck && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=debug RUST_BACKTRACE=1 RUST_LOG=holochain::core::ribosome::host_fn::debug=debug TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.json ./node_modules/tape/bin/tape -r ./node_modules/tsx/dist/preflight.cjs src/**/*.ts | tap-dot
